Journal Story: Only 25 days away from the day I'll start the biggest adventure of my life. It's really starting to become more real and I get more and more excited everyday.
2 weeks from today I'll be heading down to Georgia. Can't wait. The days are flying by. Been sleeping in the hammock that I'll be calling my bed for four or five months.
2 Weeks from today I'll be setting foot off Springer Mountain heading northbound all the way to Maine! Lately it's been all I can think about.
